targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*) FROM alert_db.device_table
WHERE category = "iot"

SELECT count(*) FROM alert_db.device_table
WHERE category = "cam"

options.content:
漏水警報 {{Water_Leakage}}
溫濕度警報 {{Temperature_Humidity}}
徘徊警報 {{Loitering_Detected}}

電量不足警報 {{Battery_Low}}
消防控制箱警報 {{FCP_Alarm}}
侵入警報 {{Intrusion_Detected}}

斷線警報 {{Sensor_Disconnect}}
門窗警報 {{Door_Contact}}
跌倒警報 {{FallDown_Detected}}
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
select
	SUM(CASE WHEN messageType = 'Water_Leakage' THEN 1 END) AS Water_Leakage,
    SUM(CASE WHEN messageType = 'Temperature_Humidity' THEN 1 END) AS Temperature_Humidity,
    SUM(CASE WHEN messageType = 'Battery_Low' THEN 1 END) AS Battery_Low,
    SUM(CASE WHEN messageType = 'Sensor_Disconnect' THEN 1 END) AS Sensor_Disconnect,
    SUM(CASE WHEN messageType = 'Loitering_Detected' THEN 1 END) AS Loitering_Detected,
    SUM(CASE WHEN messageType = 'Intrusion_Detected' THEN 1 END) AS Intrusion_Detected,
    SUM(CASE WHEN messageType = 'FallDown_Detected' THEN 1 END) AS FallDown_Detected,
    SUM(CASE WHEN messageType = 'FCP_Alarm' THEN 1 END) AS FCP_Alarm,
    SUM(CASE WHEN messageType = 'Door_Contact' THEN 1 END) AS Door_Contact
from alert_db.message_table

SELECT category, sensorName, deviceID FROM alert_db.device_table
WHERE propertyCode = "${Code}"
AND floor = "${Floor}"

WHERE deviceID = "${SensorID}" 
AND floor = "${Floor}"
